newsitem.title: USA: AMEX to list options on three stocks next week.
newsitem.headline: AMEX to list options on three stocks next week.

text.p: The American Stock Exchange (AMEX) said Thursday it would list options on Western Resources Inc on October 1.
The exchange also said it would list options on Vans Inc and Comshare Inc on October 2.
Western Resources, which closed Thursday at 28-7/8, will have opening strike prices of 25, 30 and 35. Initial expiration months will be October, November, February and May.
The AMEX said Spear, Leeds & Kellogg will be the specialist.
For Vans, opening strike prices will be 15, 17-1/2 and 20, with initial expirations of October, November, January and April.
Charlton, Goin, SLK will be the specialist unit.
Comshare options will have opening strikes of 12-1/2, 15 adn 17-1/2. Initial expirations will be October, November, February and May.
Group One Trading LP will be the specialist.
